definition: abbr. for Beijing/surname Jing/Jing ethnic minority
capital city of a country/big/algebraic term for a large number (old)/artificial mound (old)
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: I will graduate from eking University this July. I have majored in accounting.
sentences.chinese: 今年七月將從北京大學畢業，我主修的專業是會計學。

sentences.english: I'm a post-graduate of Beijing University.
sentences.chinese: 我是北京大學的一名研究生。

sentences.english: He studied physics in Beijing University for two years.
sentences.chinese: 他曾在北京大學物理系肄業兩年。

sentences.english: Dr. Huang is a professor of English literature at the Beijing University.
sentences.chinese: 黃博士是英國文學教授，執教於北京大學。

sentences.english: They rowed a race against Beijing University.
sentences.chinese: 他們與北京大學進行了划船比賽。

sentences.english: Syracuse University, Computer Science, M. Sc.
sentences.chinese: 北京大學，計算機系，本科。

sentences.english: She is reading for a degree in physics in Beijing University.
sentences.chinese: 她現在正在北京大學攻讀物理學位。

sentences.english: In 1989 I studied Chinese for one semester at Peking University.
sentences.chinese: 1989年，我在北京大學學了一個學期的漢語。

sentences.english: But you succeed. You ace the exams and get into Peking University.
sentences.chinese: 但是你成功了，你成績優異，進入了北京大學。

sentences.english: But Li Songwei, a doctor of psychology at Peking University, has an explanation.
sentences.chinese: 對此，北京大學心理學博士李松蔚作出瞭解釋。

sentences.english: "Chinese Character Art Exhibition", China Millennium Monument Art Museum and Peking University, Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 北京，中華世紀壇藝術館及北京大學。

sentences.english: Vice president of Peking University Lin Junjing attended the symposium and made his remarks.
sentences.chinese: 北京大學副校長林鈞敬到會並作了精彩發言。

sentences.english: Intellectuals in Beijing University even gave a Chinese name to Rabindranath Tagore.
sentences.chinese: 北京大學的教授甚至給泰戈爾取了中文名字。

sentences.english: 1983-1986, M. A. in Ancient Chinese History of Political Thought, Peking University.
sentences.chinese: 1986年，北京大學，中國古代政治思想史碩士。

sentences.english: Zhang Haibin, a professor from Peking University, is optimistic.
sentences.chinese: 北京大學教授張海濱對此持樂觀態度。

definition: Tsinghua or Qinghua University, Beijing/National Tsing Hua University, Hsinchu, Taiwan

pinyin: Xiang1 gang3 Zhong1 wen2 Da4 xue2

definition: Sun Yat-sen University (Guangzhou)/Sun Yat-sen University (Kaohsiung)/Sun Yat-sen University (Moscow), founded in 1925 as training ground for Chinese communists

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Ren2 min2 Da4 xue2

definition: abbr. for 清華大學|清华大学[Qing1 hua2 Da4 xue2]

pinyin: Bei3 jing1 Shi1 fan4 Da4 xue2

definition: master's degree/person who has a master's degree/learned person
Jinan University in Guangdong Province, with 4 campuses in Guangzhou, Shenzhen and Zhuhai
the head of an institution whose name ends in 院[yuan4]/chair of a board/president of a university/department head/dean/premier of the Republic of China/CL:個|个[ge4]
